name: Gamma Burst
description: Deals 30 damage to target, has a 95% chance to Irradiate (3 damage/turn) for 3 turns, or a 2% chance to 'Hulkerize' target doubling their attack power for 3 turns instead.

immediateEffect.script: DealDamage(Opponent, 30); int roll = Rng.Next(100); if (roll < 2) { AddStatus(Opponent, new StatusEffect { Name = "Hulkerized", Duration = 3, RemainingDuration = 3, IsBuff = true, HookScripts = new Dictionary<string, string> { { "OnCalculateAttack", "AttackMultiplier *= 2.0; Log(PlayerDisplayName + \" SMASH! Attack doubled!\");" } } }); Log(OpponentDisplayName + " is HULKERIZED!"); } else if (roll < 97) { ApplyDOT(Opponent, "Irradiated", 3, 3); Log(OpponentDisplayName + " is irradiated!"); }
